sqlQuery.name: DatasetPhenotypeFilterMetadata
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT track AS internal, q.name AS ontology_term_name, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS number_value, ot.name AS string_value, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS date_value FROM NIAGADS.TrackAttributes ta, Study.Characteristic c, SRes.OntologyTerm q, SRes.OntologyTerm ot WHERE c.protocol_app_node_id = ta.protocol_app_node_id AND c.qualifier_id = q.ontology_term_id AND ot.ontology_term_id = c.ontology_term_id AND (ta.track LIKE 'NG%' AND ta.track NOT SIMILAR TO '%' || '(@NON_GWAS_SS_NIAGADS@)' || '%')
UNION
SELECT track AS internal, q.name AS ontology_term_name, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS number_value, c.value AS string_value, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS date_value FROM NIAGADS.TrackAttributes ta, Study.Characteristic c, SRes.OntologyTerm q WHERE c.protocol_app_node_id = ta.protocol_app_node_id AND c.qualifier_id = q.ontology_term_id AND c.value IS NOT NULL AND (ta.track LIKE 'NG%' AND ta.track NOT SIMILAR TO '%' || '(@NON_GWAS_SS_NIAGADS@)' || '%')

sqlQuery.name: DatasetProjectFilterMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT track AS internal, 'Project' AS ontology_term_name, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS number_value, CASE WHEN name LIKE '%ADGC%' THEN 'ADGC' WHEN name LIKE '%IGAP%' THEN 'IGAP' WHEN name LIKE '%ADSP%' THEN 'ADSP' ELSE 'OTHER' END AS string_value, cast(NULL AS numeric(10)) AS date_value FROM NIAGADS.TrackAttributes ta WHERE name SIMILAR TO'%(IGAP|ADGC|ADSP)%' AND (ta.track LIKE 'NG%' AND ta.track NOT SIMILAR TO '%' || '(@NON_GWAS_SS_NIAGADS@)' || '%')

sqlQuery.name: DatasetFilterOntology
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT filter_category AS ontology_term_name, filter_category AS display_name, 'string' AS type, CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(10)) AS is_range, CASE WHEN filter_category_parent IS NULL THEN CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) ELSE filter_category_parent END AS parent_ontology_term_name, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS description, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS units, CAST(NULL AS NUMERIC(10)) AS precision FROM NIAGADS.ProtocolAppNodeCharacteristic WHERE track LIKE 'NG%' AND track NOT SIMILAR TO '%' || '(NG00061)' || '%'

sqlQuery.name: DatasetPhenotypeFilterOntology
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT q.name AS ontology_term_name, q.name AS display_name, 'string' AS type, CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(10)) AS is_range, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS parent_ontology_term_name, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS description, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS units, CAST(NULL AS NUMERIC(10)) AS precision FROM NIAGADS.TrackAttributes ta, Study.Characteristic c, SRes.OntologyTerm q WHERE ta.protocol_app_node_id = c.protocol_app_node_id AND c.qualifier_id = q.ontology_term_id AND (ta.track LIKE 'NG%' AND ta.track NOT SIMILAR TO '%' || '(@NON_GWAS_SS_NIAGADS@)' || '%')

sqlQuery.name: DatasetProjectFilterOntology
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'Project' AS ontology_term_name, 'Project' AS display_name, 'string' AS type, CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(10)) AS is_range, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS parent_ontology_term_name, 'sequencing project' AS description, CAST(NULL AS CHARACTER VARYING(10)) AS units, CAST(NULL AS NUMERIC(10)) AS precision
